title: Geometry Lab — Vesica, Hexagram, Rose 12, Golden Rectangle
summary: Exact constructions for cathedral geometry; parametric and ND-safe.
safe_use: Calm lines; no fast animation; exact math (no eyeballing).
procedures: Vesica: centers separated by radius r; stroke width 6–10px.
Hexagram: 6 points at 60°; draw two equilateral triangles.
Rose 12: petals at 30° increments; keep petal symmetry clean.
Golden rectangle: subdivide by φ; optional quiet spiral.
